outputs.output_descr:
Output 5: Senior and middle management in civil service apply knowledge and skills acquired through the Transformational Leadership and Managerial Skills Development Programme (TLMSDP) in their work, 
Output 6: TLMS Performance Management Framework for 4 selected institutions developed, 
Output 14: Legislation on access to information and media freedom reviewed, 
Output 15: Civic education strategy/programme and monitoring framework developed

Output 7: Local Government capacity database updated annually, 
Output 8: Local Government Performance Standards and Monitoring Framework developed

Output 9: Selected international instruments translated into national legal frameworks (e.g. International Bill of Human Rights, CEDAW, Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, Convention on the Rights of the Child, UNCAC), 
Output 10: Implementation of concluding remarks and recommendations of State reports and international instruments monitored

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: Constitution reflecting ratified international human rights instruments drafted
Output 2: Costed Implementation Plan (including monitoring framework) of Draft Constitution developed
Output 3: Institutional/legal arrangements for implementation of human rights provisions of new constitution revised
Output 4: Provincial consultations conducted

project_descr: Government of the Republic of Zambia (GRZ) - United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) Governance Programme (2011-2015)
